definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: Tympanic center leaves the alveolus of one desiccate.
sentences.chinese: 鼓膜中心则留下一变干的小孔。

sentences.english: Behind each eye there is an ear drum.
sentences.chinese: 每只眼睛后面都有个鼓膜。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the status of tympanic membranes(TMs) and middle ears after tympanostomy tube insertions in children with otitis media with effusion(OME).
sentences.chinese: 目的随访分析儿童分泌性中耳炎鼓膜置管后的状况。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the application of tele-otoscope in myringoplasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼓膜镜在鼓膜成形术中的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the application of tele-otoscope in myringoplasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼓膜镜在鼓膜成形术中的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Conclusions: Biologic protein sponge is effective material mending the perforation of eardrum.
sentences.chinese: 结论生物蛋白海绵可促进鼓膜穿孔修复和愈合。

sentences.english: You had better open your mouth to relieve the pressure on your eardrums.
sentences.chinese: 你最好张开嘴以减轻耳朵鼓膜所受的压力。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the complications and its prevention of myringotomy with grommet insertion in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童鼓膜切开置管术并发症的原因及防治。

sentences.english: The tympanic membrane is visible at the distal termination of the horizontal canal.
sentences.chinese: 鼓膜在水平耳道的末端可见。

sentences.english: This network of blood vessels is important for repair of damage to the tympanic membrane.
sentences.chinese: 这张血管网对于鼓膜损伤的修复至关重要。

sentences.english: My eardrums and eyeballs should burst.
sentences.chinese: 我应该鼓膜和眼球破裂。

sentences.english: His eardrums had been punctured by the force of the explosion .
sentences.chinese: 他的耳鼓膜被爆炸的气浪震破。

sentences.english: I refused to wear headphones because they can perforate your eardrums.
sentences.chinese: 我不愿戴耳机，因为它可能会使鼓膜穿孔。

sentences.english: Oral, Rectal and Tympanic Thermometers are now archaic with this NEW infrared technology.
sentences.chinese: 口服，直肠及鼓膜温度计现在过时这一新红外线技术。

sentences.english: The ear scales, the tympanic membranes, are the two large 'scales' just behind the jaw-bone.
sentences.chinese: 龟龟的耳鼓膜通常在下颚骨的后边。

sentences.english: Objective Evaluation of the effect in myringoplasty using antilobium perichondrium graft.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察耳屏软骨膜行鼓膜成型术的效果。

definition: external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
chain of ossicles (in the middle ear)
ossicles (of the middle ear)/three ossicles, acting as levers to amplify sound, namely: stapes or stirrup bone 鐙骨|镫骨, incus or anvil bone 砧骨, malleus or hammer bone 錘骨|锤骨
ossicles (in the middle ear)/also written 聽小骨|听小骨
stapes or stirrup bone of middle ear, passing sound vibration to the inner ear
